sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Container, Box, Grid, Paper, } from "@mui/material"; import { createTheme, ThemeProvider } from "@mui/material/styles"; import LinkedInIcon from "@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn"; import GitHubIcon from "@mui/icons-material/GitHub"; import { Link as ScrollLink, Element } from "react-scroll"; import "./HomePage.css"; import homeImage from '../images/home.png'; const theme = createTheme({ palette: { primary: { main: "#004643", }, secondary: { main: "#FAF4D3", }, background: { default: "#0C1618", // Main background color }, text: { primary: "#FAF4D3", // Main text color secondary: "#FAF4D3", // Accent text color }, }, typography: { h1: { fontSize: "3rem", fontWeight: 700, marginBottom: "1rem", }, h2: { fontSize: "2rem", fontWeight: 500, marginBottom: "1rem", }, body1: { fontSize: "1.25rem", marginBottom: "1.5rem", }, button: { fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: 600, }, }, }); function HomePage() { return ( Resume Management Tool for LaTeX {/* Left Side Content */} Welcome to the Resume Management Tool Simplify Your Resume Creation Manage and generate LaTeX resumes in seconds. Start now to take control of your professional documents with ease. {/* Right Side Image */} Key Features Translate Filter Easily translate your resume into multiple languages with a single click. Our tool integrates seamlessly with Google Translate API, ensuring accuracy and efficiency. Date Filter Filter your resume by date effortlessly. Manage different versions and track career progression with ease, generating customized resumes based on specific timeframes. Section Filter Streamline your resume by section. Customize your resume by selecting only the relevant sections, enhancing clarity and relevance. SubSection Filter Streamline your resume by subsection. Customize your resume by applying filters to specified subsections. Reorder Filter Arrange resume sections effortlessly. Rearrange your resume sections as needed to emphasize key strengths and experiences. Documentation {/* Part 1: Restrictions */} Restrictions
  1. Sem comentarios
  2. Parentises todos espaados ?
  3. Ter cuidado com as seces que manda traduzir por causa de referencias.
  4. Para o filtro das sections funcionar direito, os nomes das sections tem que ter texto limpo, sem comandos pelo meio do tipo "\comando"
  5. Para o filtro das datas funcionar, o utilizador deve adicionar o seguinte comando no inicio do curriculo:{" "} {"\\newcommand{\\daterange}[1]{#1}"}

    Todas as datas devem estar definidas usando este comando, para o filtro funcionar corretamente. Exemplo:{" "} {"\\daterange{2014-2020}"}
{/* Part 2: DSL Explanation and Query Examples */} DSL (Domain-Specific Language) Explanation The Domain-Specific Language (DSL) defined by us provides a structured way to query and manipulate resumes using specific commands. It allows users to perform operations such as selecting sections, filtering by criteria like dates or themes, translating content into different languages, exporting data, and reordering resume sections. The DSL aims to simplify the management and customization of resumes by offering a clear syntax for executing these tasks efficiently. Query Examples

Example 1: Selecting specific sections

Show 'Work experience', 'Education'
-- Returns only the sections 'Work experience' and 'Education'


Example 2: Selecting all sections

Show *
-- Returns all sections


Example 3: Filtering a specific section by date

Show * Filtered By SECTION = 'Education' AND DATE >= '2010'
-- Returns the entire file, filtering the 'Education' section by date


Example 4: Filtering multiple sections by different dates

Show * Filtered By (section = 'Education Universitary' AND DATE > '2010') OR (subsection = 'Chair person' AND DATE = '2010')
-- Returns the entire file, filtering specified sections by different dates


Example 5: Filtering the entire file by date

Show * Filtered By DATE > '2010'
-- Returns the entire file, filtering by date


Example 6: Filtering the entire file by date, except for a specific section

Show * Filtered By SECTION != 'Education' and DATE > '2010'
-- Returns the entire file, filtering by date, excluding the 'Education' section


Example 7: Filtering file for specific sections and date

Show 'Professional Experience', 'Education' Filtered By DATE > '2010'
-- Returns only the sections 'Professional Experience' and 'Education' with dates greater than 2010


Example 8: Selecting specific sections, filtering subsection for date

Show 'Professional Experience', 'Education' Filtered By subsection = 'Chair person' and date > '2010'
-- Returns only the sections 'Professional Experience' and 'Education' filtering the subsection 'Chair person' by date


Example 9: Translating resume into another language

TRANSLATE FROM 'fr' ; TO 'en' ;
-- Translates the resume from French to English


Example 10: Reordering sections

REORDER 'Professional Experience', 'Education', 'Projects'
-- Reorders the sections of the resume as specified

Try Now! Upload your LaTeX resume file and see the magic happen. Our tool will process your file and provide you a simple query language to manage your resume. 2024 Your Company Name. All rights reserved. ); } export default HomePage;
